attributes.action: Make it illegal to refuse a dog treatment at a vets based on cropped ears
attributes.additional_details: No dog should ever be refused treatment because of something that is out of the dogs control.
attributes.background:
In Nala’s name we ask that veterinary practices are stopped from refusing medical treatment because the dog has cropped ears.
The dog is not accountable for their ears being cropped, and should not be condemned to death or harm based on assumptions and labelling theory.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about whether to provide veterinary services are a matter for individual veterinary practices, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a free Animal Health Service for pets please: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581142

Create a “PHS (Pet Health Service)” Scheme paid for by pet owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564754
